column4: n}}) was the fifteenth [[King of Rohan]].

column1: Fengel was the third and only surviving son of [[Folcwine]], and became king after the death of his father in {{TA
Fengel's two older brothers, [[Folcred]] and [[Fastred (son of Folcwine)
column2: Fastred]], were killed in [[Harondor]] while fighting for [[Gondor]], and as a result Fengel grew up rather spoiled. As a grown man he became known for his greed and love of gold.

column1: His son [[Thengel]] left Rohan because of disagreements with his father, living with [[Morwen Steelsheen
After a rule of over 50 years Fengel died in {{TA
column2: 2953}}, and Thengel reluctantly returned to Rohan.<ref>{{App
